official_title: PET Biodistribution Study of 68Ga-FAPI-46 in Patients With Prostate Cancer: A Prospective Exploratory Biodistribution Study With Histopathology Validation
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients who underwent a 68Ga-PSMA-11 PET/CT scan within 3 months of enrollment
* Patients who are scheduled to undergo surgical excision or biopsy of a prostate cancer primary, recurrent or metastatic lesion
* Patients can provide written informed consent
* Patients are able to remain still for duration of imaging procedure (up to one hour)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients with any new prostate therapy between the PSMA PET/CT and the FAP inhibitor (FAPI) PET/CT
